body:
I think this was a game a while back, but I haven't seen it in a while so...

What do you think of the player above you?
What's the first word that comes to your mind?
What do you recognize them for?

Answer 1 or more of these questions about the person above you! 

-If this is still going in the other thread I couldn't find it, and you can lock this but I didn't find it. ;p <3
